body: The author is pretty good at writing, wish there was more from him translated, is there more stuff like this? Good writing but hentai?
Don't give up miss futaba! You can defeat it! 😣😣😣😣😣😣😣😣😣😣😣😣😣🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🧨🧨🧨🧨🧨💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣💣

I'm a little confused, mostly because the one starring the red-haired girl has the "Snuff" tag, yet it seems she's alive in here. Are these all their own continuity? This is, of course, ignoring the obvious fact this magical girl dies(?) in both this one and the one with the succubus... Hmm, well, still, fascinating stuff overall, and very cool powers and usage of them. Love that shit.
the girl, the story, the personality and the monster, it's very good, it has a certain touch of being mysterious, and a special touch, quite cool, ty
